projects.title: Checklos Homepage
projects.bodyText:
- Homepage for the checklos
 Checklos is a food delivery app for food items. 
 - The Site was built with ReactJs and Gatsby for speed of access

projects.title: React Search and Sort App
projects.bodyText:
- A demo react app for listing 2500 book records. 
-  The app sorts the books in ascending and descending order. 
 - The app also filters the books in defined categories
